chapters.title: Chapter 1: Seeds of Shadow
chapters.info: Leane Sharif, p. 26 (13)—The Keeper of the Chronicles under Siuan Sanche; an Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah. She is very tall for a woman, as tall as most men, and has coppery skin. She grew up in Arad Doman. Siuan thinks (correctly) that Leane would lay down her life for her, but she is still reluctant to tell her everything she does, particularly her efforts to root out the Black Ajah. See also Keeper of the Chronicles.
